Articles.Content:
Since the old thread was burned and vaprized during the DDoS war of April, I will make a new one. Begin.

(BSB : Before Kerbals. Units are measured in Kerbalized Geo-Orbital Units, or five earth years...)

184,774,775,926,999,999,999,133 BSB- The Universe is formed.

124,772,232 BSB - is formed, as a Class M star.

13,726,121 BSB - Kerbin is formed.

473,337 BSB - First life forms on Kerbin.

3,737 BSB - First mass-extinction. Kerbin is almost sterilized of life.

2,381 BSB - Kerbalius Homospius, an extremely primitive form of Kerbals, takes shaped

0 BSB - Kerbals evolve from their primitive state.

1493 BSB - First Recorded use of writing.

1842 BSB - Kerbals develop the the knowledge of fire.

2000 BSB - Kerbals use their knowledge of metallurgy to create weapons.

2130 BSB - First recorded rocket. Kerbals now use rockets to send their elders to the underworld,

Still working...

3,737 BSB - First mass-extinction. Kerbin is almost sterilized of life.

Sounds like the Krakens doing!

2130 BSB - First recorded rocket. Kerbals now use rockets to send their elders to the underworld,

I think that should be overworld because underworld seems like they carry it to a high point and then try to launch it so it burriess into the ground kind of kerbally but seems better as over world in my opinion

2131 BSB Jebediah Kerman Is Born

Edited May 21, 2013 by Agent30632

2131 BSB Jebediah Kerman Is Born

That does sound about right.

2150 BSB Jebediah Kerman reforms the use of rockets to be used as a device of exploration (and destruction)

2151 BSB First recorded encounter with the Kraken

2131 BSB Mun is discovered by Jebidiah Kerman after the One-Year-Old accidentally got trapped on a rocket sent to the aboveworld.

2135 BSB Wernher Von Kerman becomes senior rocket scientist for Nazkis, Unwillingly.

2150 BSB Von Kerman then helps Jebidiah build a 3-man capsule to go to the Mun

2167 BSB First Mun Landing, Kerpollo 11

2184 BSB Minmus is discovered, originally thought to be a broken pixel.

2199 BSB Y2Kerb Issue freaks everyone out.

2200 BSB Y2Kerb Issue is totally resolved.

2205 BSB - Nazki Governance of Kerbin ends.

2209 BSB - Kerbal Space Center upgrades Tracking Station, and relays information to astronomers for study.

2212 BSB - Duna and Eve are simultaneously discovered by amateur astronomers on opposite sides of Kerbin. In fact, these astronomers were Bill and Bob Kerman at their vacation homes.

2213 BSB - Wernher Von Kerman designs 1-man capsule for a mission to Duna. Konstellation mission begins, but is nearly cancelled due to 1-hour lack of funding.

2215 BSB - Bill Kerman heads to Duna atop Class-S5 Rocket on Konstellation Mission.

2215 BSB (2) - En route to Duna, the S5 Capsule carrying Bill Kerman loses communication with Kerbin. Ike is discovered 6 hours before.

2218 BSB - Communication with Bill Kerman in S5 Capsule resumes. Flyby of Duna and Ike occurred, but the S5 Capsule did not make it into orbit.

2218 BSB (2) - Information patched to KSC Mission Control from Bill Kerman. Images of a new planet with five moons signifies the inadvertent discovery of Jool and its moons.

2220 BSB - Kraken discovered to be altering the orbit of one of Jool's moons (Bop). Society perceives this as a move to destroy Kerbin.

2222 BSB - Krakensbane device is developed by Wernher Von Kerman. Kraken 'dies' upon Bop, as observed by Bill Kerman.

2223 BSB - Bob Kerman notices a small spot moving across Kerbol. Noticing that Eve is larger, Bob relays the discovery of Moho to KSC.

2226 BSB - Kerbals stop trying to wipe Gilly off the lenses of their telescopes, and discover it is actually a moon orbiting Eve. Glasses industry increases by 25000% as astronomers try to be the first to discover something about Gilly.

2227 BSB - Secret prototypes of docking clamps undergo a series of rigorous tests. Kerbals passing by the testing facility are annoyed by the loud rolling-scraping-clanking-thudding sounds made during the tests. Probes and solar panels also undergo tests.

2596 BSB - Kraken is killed, body has not yet been found

2673 BSB - The body of the Kraken has been found on Bop

And...

2436 BSB - First interplanetary mission is completed by Jebediah Kerman, Bob Kerman, and Bill Kerman

2596 BSB - Kraken is killed, body has not yet been found

2673 BSB - The body of the Kraken has been found on Bop

And...

2436 BSB - First interplanetary mission is completed by Jebediah Kerman, Bob Kerman, and Bill Kerman

You're doing it wrong. Plus, these were already covered.
